list_definition.definition: to judge size, amount, value etc, especially roughly or without measuring

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He estimated that the journey would take two hours.

list_definition.definition: to form an idea or judgement of how good etc something is

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I estimated my chances of escape as very good.

list_definition.definition: a calculation (eg of the probable cost etc of something)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He gave us an estimate of the cost of repairing the stonework
